name: Mystic Code: Chaldea
detail: Provided to the Masters of Chaldea Security Organization

skills.name: First Aid
skills.detail: Greatly restore one ally's HP

skills.name: Instant Enhancement
skills.detail: Significantly increase one ally's ATK (1 turn)

skills.name: Emergency Evade
skills.detail: Apply Evade for one ally (1 turn)

name: Mystic Code: Chaldea Combat Uniform
detail: Created by the tech team at the Chaldea Security Organization to withstand harsh and intense battlefields.

skills.name: Buff All Allies
skills.detail: Increase all allies' ATK (1 turn)

skills.name: Gandr
skills.detail: Inflict Stun to one enemy (1 turn)

skills.name: Order Change
skills.detail: Switch one active member with a sub-member

name: Mystic Code: Mage's Association Uniform
detail: Given to outstanding students acknowledged by the Mage's Association.

skills.name: Cure-All
skills.detail: Restore all allies' HP

skills.name: Spiritron Transfer
skills.detail: Increase NP Gauge for one ally

skills.name: Command Shuffle
skills.detail: Redistribute Command Cards

name: Mystic Code: Atlas Institute Uniform
detail: Created by the Atlas Institute to be the "most powerful" Mystic Code.

skills.name: Dust of Osiris
skills.detail: Apply Invincible to one ally (1 turn)

buffs.name: Invincible
buffs.detail: Ignore Sure Hit and reduce ATK damage to 0

skills.name: Rain of Isis
skills.detail: Remove one ally's Debuffs

skills.name: Eyes of Medjed
skills.detail: Reduce one ally's skill cooldown by 2

name: Anniversary Blonde
detail: Replica of the costume once worn by the King of Knights

skills.name: Mana Burst
skills.detail: Significantly increase one ally's Buster Card effectiveness (1 turn)

skills.name: Confident in Victory
skills.detail: Gain large amounts of C. Stars

skills.name: Knight's Oath
skills.detail: Apply Guts to one ally (1 time, 1 turn)

buffs.name: Guts
buffs.detail: When HP reaches 0, recover HP and survive

name: Royal Brand
detail: A Mystic Code once used by a beautiful knight during a certain Holy Grail War.

skills.name: Reaction Reinforcement
skills.detail: Increase one ally's Quick Card effectiveness (1 turn)

skills.name: Iron Devotion
skills.detail: Increase one ally's C. Star Gather Rate (1 turn)

skills.name: Inescapable
skills.detail: Apply Sure Hit to one ally (1 turn)

buffs.name: Sure Hit
buffs.detail: Ignore Evade and deal ATK damage

name: Brilliant Summer
detail:
Anti-Tropical Environmental Gear created by the Da Vinci Workshop.
In other words, a swimsuit, but also a Mystic Code with combat functions.

skills.name: Rumble Party
skills.detail: Increase Quick Card effectiveness for all allies (1 turn)

skills.name: Deadly Trident
skills.detail: Apply Ignore Invincible for a single ally (1 turn)

buffs.name: Ignore Invincible
buffs.detail: Ignore Evade and Invincible to deal damage

skills.name: Beach House Shower
skills.detail: Restore HP & increase NP Gauge for a single ally

name: Memories of the Lunar Sea
detail:
A Mystic Code modeled after a certain school's uniform
from a certain parallel world.

skills.name: Spiritron Boost
skills.detail: Increase an ally's Arts Card effectiveness (1 turn)

skills.name: Stepping Stone to Ultimate Victory
skills.detail: Increase an ally's Critical Star drop rate (1 turn)

skills.name: Punishment
skills.detail: Apply Nullify Buff to a single enemy (1 time)

name: Memories of the Far Side of the Moon
detail: A Mystic Code patterned after the old uniform of a certain school located in a parallel world.

skills.name: Spiritron Boost (All)
skills.detail: Increase all allies' Arts Card effectiveness (1 turn)

skills.name: Stepping Stone To Survival
skills.detail: Apply Debuff Immune (1 time) for one ally

skills.name: Dial Down
skills.detail: Decrease one enemy's Charge by 1

name: A Fragment of 2004
detail: A Mystic Code patterned after the school uniform once worn by several of the Masters who battled for the Holy Grail in a certain rural city in Japan.

skills.name: Code: F
skills.detail: Increase NP Strength (1 turn) for one ally

skills.name: Code: U
skills.detail: Increase Buster Card C. Star Gather Rate (1 turn) for one ally

buffs.name: C. Star Gather Up: Buster
buffs.detail: Increase C. Star Gather Rate for Buster Cards

skills.name: Code: H
skills.detail: Increase NP Gain (1 turn) for one ally

name: Mystic Code: Chaldea Uniform - Arctic
detail: A Mystic Code created in anticipation of the wearer encountering extreme cold.

skills.name: Purifying Recovery
skills.detail: Restore HP & remove DEF Debuffs for one ally

skills.name: Illusionary Buff
skills.detail: Increase ATK (1 turn) & increase NP Strength (1 turn) for one ally

skills.name: Predictive Evasion
skills.detail: Apply Evade to one ally (1 time, 3 turns)

name: Tropical Summer
detail:
Anti-Tropical Weather Environmental Gear created in Da Vinci's Workshop.
...It's a Hawaiian shirt, but also a Mystic Code with combat functions.

skills.name: Blue Splash
skills.detail: Increase Arts Card effectiveness (1 turn) & NP Strength (1 turn) for a single ally

skills.name: Surprise Water
skills.detail: Increase a single ally's Arts Card's C. Star Gather Rate (1 turn)

buffs.name: C. Star Gather Up: Arts
buffs.detail: Increase the C. Star Gather Rate for Arts Cards

skills.name: Safety Oil
skills.detail: Increase Buff Removal Resist (1 turn) & NP Gauge for a single ally

name: Splendid New Year
detail:
A special outfit made to represent Japanese culture.
It's the first fashion design collaboration between Da Vinci and Sion.

skills.name: First Shine
skills.detail: Increase all allies' NP Strength (1 turn)

skills.name: Little Gift
skills.detail: Increase NP Gauge + gain C. Stars for one ally

skills.name: Osechi Package
skills.detail: Increase Max HP (1 turn) for one ally

name: Chaldea Uniform - True Ether
detail: A Mystic Code created in anticipation of the wearer being in an environment full of True Ether in the Age of Gods.

skills.name: All-out Charge
skills.detail: Increase Buster Card effectiveness for all allies (1 turn)

skills.name: Triple Restoration
skills.detail: Restore HP each turn for one ally (3 turns)

buffs.name: HP Recovery Per Turn
buffs.detail: Recover HP at end of each turn

skills.name: Mana Conversion
skills.detail: Increase NP Gauge & NP Gain (1 turn) for one ally
